mapper.select: select pi.file_name as fileName , pp.productpost_id as productpostId from Product p join ProductPost pp on pp.product_id = p.product_id join ProductImage pi on pi.product_id = p.product_id where p.productgroup_id = #{productgroupId} and pi.sort_order = 1

select ppq.productpostqna_id as productpostqnaId, ppq.title as title, ppq.content as content, ppq.write_date as writeDate, ppq.answer_title as answerTitle, ppq.answer_content as answerContent, ppq.answer_date as answerDate, ppq.productpost_id as productpostId, m.nickname as nickname, m.members_id as membersId from ProductPostQna ppq join Members m on m.members_id = ppq.members_id where ppq.productpost_id = #{productPostId}

select ps.product_id as productId, ps.shoe_size as shoeSize, pso.quantity as quantity, odr.orderreview_id as orderreviewId, odr.content as content, odr.rating as rating, odr.like_count as likeCount, odr.write_date as writeDate, odr.is_blind as isBlind, ori.file_name as fileName, m.nickname as nickname, m.members_id as membersId from ProductStock ps join ProductStockOrder pso on pso.productstock_id = ps.productstock_id join OrderReview odr on pso.productstockorder_id = odr.productstockorder_id join OrderReviewImage ori on ori.orderreview_id = odr.orderreview_id join Orders od on od.orders_id = pso.orders_id join Members m on m.members_id = od.members_id where ps.product_id = #{productId}

select nvl(avg(odr.rating), 0) as rating from ProductStock ps join ProductStockOrder pso on ps.productstock_id = pso.productstock_id join OrderReview odr on odr.productstockorder_id = pso.productstockorder_id where ps.product_id = #{productId}
